name: Blister Wings
description:
Take Wing and Defend the City!

Skybound City is suddenly slammed by Separatists. It’s up to you to lead the fight against them. Take back the city with mighty powerups: Destroy three of the same type of ship in a row to activate one of three abilities to crank up your counterattack against the onslaught of villainous ships.

Controls

Move: WASD / Left Joystick

Shoot: Left Mouse Button / Right Trigger

Aim: Mouse / Right Joystick

Credits

Webster University Game Development Club

Art: Beck Myers

Programming & Design: Mark Watson, Justin Baldridge, Austan Harris

Music: Gavin Barrett-Hayes

Sound Effects: ZapSplat.com
